title: New Bontrager Foray & Evoke MTB shoes join Cadence Spin shoes for varied terrain
content:
Looking for one cycling shoe for all your offroad riding? The new Bontrager Foray aims to be the best shoe for gravel, cyclocross and mountain biking thanks to abundant tread, toe protection, and a stiff-yet-walkable sole. With a $159.99 MSRP and four understated colors, it hits a nice mid point for price and features in […]

The post New Bontrager Foray & Evoke MTB shoes join Cadence Spin shoes for varied terrain appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
